name: RocketGO
description: RocketGO offers entertaining ways to pilot the rocket for the universe exploration. Six planets with unique landscapes and extreme conditions will challenge your piloting skills. You can upgrade the rocket using alien artefacts you discovered in the hidden places. Get ready for the space adventure!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 1.8 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space
